topic.title: ZeroBoard error
topic.body:
"Message submit failed! Parsing parameters... Please try again later."

Why I have this error when I try to send my second message? 

thanks

topic.title: Docs about "site cloneable" in ZeroNet
topic.body: Hello, where are the docs explaining this feature? I'm making a clonable site, and I would love to know how it works, thanks!

6_1NWh3WAty57FH8at1WtrZigMrdhrDkuPzh.body: So right now, if the ZeroNet servers goes offline, the ZeroNet dies?
does the ZeroNet uses the same trackers as the bittorrent network?

1_1CWttfFnJgQmZifX8FbZn9dZ3xaTfooSJd.body: I have the error only when I try to add two messages, one after the another.

POST https://demo.zeronet.io/ZeroBoard/add.php 403 (Forbidden)k.cors.a.crossDomain.send @ all.js:9n.extend.ajax @ all.js:9n.(anonymous function) @ all.js:9ZeroBoard.submitMessage @ all.js:592(anonymous function) @ all.js:541n.event.dispatch @ all.js:8r.handle @ all.js:8
all.js:107 [ZeroFrame] Message submitted Object {readyState: 4, responseText: " Parsing parameters...â†µPlease try again later.", status: 403, statusText: "Forbidden"} error Forbidden

2_1BidR2Pw65fTPeh1R3LbwCdfEJUPB6FLes.body: hello, I don't know if it's a bug with the js of ZeroNet or the problem comes from the proxy. But when I'm using my phone (Nexus 5X), the links doesn't work really good in this forum ( Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit ). I need to "click" multiples times in the links to make it work. Is anybody else having this issue?
